message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would really be valuable to you.  I'm asking for $200 to start. What do you think?
Hi Alice,  $200 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $120 right now. What do you think?
I understand you're on a bit of a budget, Bob.  I can't do $120, but how about we meet halfway at $160?
Alice,  $160 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $140. Let's try to find a middle ground.
